body.name: Video Doorbell Camera Wireless for Home Security, Ring Chime Included, 100% Non-Wired, Smart AI Human Detection, Two-Way Audio, HD Live Image, Night Vision, Indoor Surveillance
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 12 mins
features: AI-Powered Precision Human Detection: Harness the power of cutting-edge AI technology to accurately recognize human presence, while efficiently ignoring irrelevant motion such as cars and trees.

Robust Cloud Storage Security: Benefit from AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with an optional subscription plan (sold separately), complete with a 30-day free trial for uninterrupted recording, reviewing, and sharing capabilities.

Bonus Chime for Ultimate Convenience: Install the complimentary doorbell chime in your dining room, kitchen, or terrace to receive instant notifications. Effortlessly link multiple chimes to a single doorbell for maximum versatility.
Advanced Night Vision Technology: Six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor deliver crystal-clear, high-resolution videos in low-light environments, 24/7.
Real-Time Two-Way Communication: Effortlessly engage with visitors from any location, in real-time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultimate Smart Doorbell Camera: Your Home's Ultimate Guardian Real-Time Two-Way Communication Effortlessly engage with visitors from any location, in real-time.

Key Features Smart Motion Sensing Technology Receive instant alerts on your mobile device when motion is detected, keeping you up-to-date with activities at your doorstep. Advanced Night Vision Technology Six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor deliver crystal-clear, high-resolution videos in low-light environments, 24/7. Breathtaking Wide-Angle Lens Quality Experience live footage with exceptional clarity and exquisite detail.

Updated 1080P FHD Edition This doorbell camera is 1080P, which captures more details than 720P camera . Bonus Chime for Ultimate Convenience Install the complimentary doorbell chime in your dining room, kitchen, or terrace to receive instant notifications. Effortlessly link multiple chimes to a single doorbell for maximum versatility. Rugged Weather Resistance Boasting IP65 dustproof and waterproof certification, this video doorbell delivers unwavering security in diverse weather conditions all year round.

Easy Set Up & Installation Useful Tips 1. There is insulation tape at the bottom of batteries. Please open the battery door, remove insulation tape, then put the battery back in. 2. Simply remove the insulation tape and fully charge before initial use. Rechargeable batteries can be powered using the included USB cable and a DC 5V 1A or 5V 2A power adapter (adapter not provided). 3. Crafted for 2.4G Wi-Fi (5G Wi-Fi not supported), this doorbell camera includes a free Doorbell Chime, ensuring you never miss a visitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alphapeach video camera
reviews.reviewText: The video camera is easy to setup there is step by step instructions. Real easy to setup. The price is not bad compared to all of these high price video cameras. The battery last for a while. Good battery life. The video quality is clear you can actually see the person. I recommend this product first before spending several hundred dollars on an expensive one.Try it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars “So simple to install “
reviews.reviewText: Install time was so simple. I already had a camera off my garage set up. I just opened the app added the door bell scanned it with my phone DONE! Hardware was included. I had to use was a screwdriver and slide it into the base. Total time 15 minutes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The camera was 30 minutes late letting me know that my husband was in the house. it does not span it looks directly ahead you can't see on the side or a little bit under it it just points directly ahead you can't see anything else but what's straight in front of you so no I don't like it and I'm kind of upset. Night 2 the night video sucks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Work so good… good quality and it captures any motion movement and the videos are crispy clear… definitely a five stars ⭐️ if

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The set up was easy and the picture is very clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but excellent product.
reviews.reviewText: I like the simplicity of installation, and the ease of using the app

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice doorbell. Have an older model that works great. Thos one will be a nice addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Range of view is limited, you must pay for cloud starage
reviews.reviewText: I like this product fine enough, it comes with everything you need to set it up, however you'll have to have a drill or something to hang it in your door. The range of view is limited as it only shows what is directly in front of where you placed it and nothing else. The advertisement will leave you with the impression that cloud storage is included with the device to which you can plug it up to a computer to extract the videos and pictures that might have been taken. However, you'll have to pay a small fee each month to maintain the cloud storage that is offered. Overall, the device has only been installed for a few days but I enjoy the extra security it provides.Update on this device: only one person can be longed in at once. My partner and I would both like to have access to the app but once one person logs in, the other is immediately logged out.
